sheet_name: Assets Quality

,Notes,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(a) Profit after tax as a percentage of average equity,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(b) Profit before tax (annualised) as a percentage of average assets,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(c) Profit after tax (annualised) as a percentage of average assets,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(d)Interest income less interest expenses,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(e)Gross income includes net interest income and non-interest income,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,"(f)Non-interest expenses includes operating expenses of the bank and excludes provisions for bad & doubtful debt, provisions for decline in value of held to maturity investments, VAT on financial services and Corporate taxes",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(g)Share of staff expenses in non-interest expenses (operating expenses),,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(h)The ratio of interest expenses and non-interest expenses to interest income and non-interest income,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(i)The ratio of non-interest expenses to (gross income + recoveries - specific provision charged to income - write off - provision for decline in value of held to maturity investments). Gross income includes net interest income and non-interest income,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,* Provisional Data,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

sheet_name: Liquidity

,Notes,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(a)The ratio of liquid assets as defined in the Banking Act to total assets,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(b)The ratio of liquid assets as defined in the Banking Act to total liabilities subject to minimum liquid assets requirement in Domestic Banking Unit,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(c)The ratio of liquid assets as defined in the Banking Act to total liabilities subject to minimum liquid assets requirement in Offshore Banking Unit,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(d)The ratio of liquid assets as defined in the Banking Act to total deposits,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(e)Share of current (demand) deposits and savings deposits in total deposits. (CASA Ratio),,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(f)The ratio of total loans (net of interest in suspense) to total deposits ,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(g)The ratio of total loans (net of interest in suspense) to total deposits and total borrowings,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,"(h)The ratio of liquid assets as defined in the Banking Act to short term liabilities which encompasses short term element of debt liabilities (deposit liability, borrowings and other liabilities) ",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(i)The ratio of total deposits to total loans (net of interest in suspense),,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,* Provisional Data,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

<new sheet>
sheet_name: Assets-Funding Structure

,Banking Sector,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
Code,"Assets-Funding Structure, %",2008,,,,2009,,,,2010,,,,2011,,,,2012,,,,2013,,,,2014,,,,2015,,,,2016,,,,2017,,,,2018,,,,2019,,,,2020,,,,2021*,,,
,,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4

,Notes,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(a)The share of total deposits in total assets/(total liabilities & equity),,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(b)The share of total borrowings in total assets/(total liabilities & equity),,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(c)The share of total capital in total assets/(total liabilities & equity),,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,(d)The share of foreign currency denominated debt in total liabilities (total liabilities except equity),,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
,* Provisional Data,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
